tool_description: Calculates appropriate medication dosages based on patient factors, drug characteristics, and clinical indication.

drug_name.description: Name of the medication to dose

route.description: Route of administration: oral, IV, IM, topical

renal_function.description: Renal function status: normal, mild, moderate, severe, dialysis

error_messages: Drug not found: The specified drug is not in the dosing database.
Invalid indication: The indication is not recognized for this medication.
Invalid route: Use one of [oral, IV, IM, topical] or consult drug-specific routes.
Invalid renal function: Use one of [normal, mild, moderate, severe, dialysis].
Dosing not available: No established dosing for this patient population.
usage: Provide drug_name, patient_weight, patient_age, and clinical indication. Specify route and renal_function if different from defaults.
